mng: youngest, most junior, tiny, one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military), one or ace on dice or dominoes, variant of 吆[yao1], to shout

exm.mng: youngest, most junior, tiny, one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military), one or ace on dice or dominoes, variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
pair of aces (in dominoes), double one
one-two or ace-deuce (smallest throw at dice), a prostitute
idemfactor (expressing a vector as sum of its three orthogonal projections)
